GAUNTLET_START.text: Let's see if you have what it takes, mortal.
Your trial begins now. Try not to disappoint me.
Another soul dares to challenge me? Amusing.

CORRECT_ANSWER_EASY.text: Fine, whatever. That was an easy one anyway.
Even a goblin could answer that. I'm not impressed.
Correct. A single drop of knowledge in your ocean of ignorance.

CORRECT_ANSWER_MEDIUM.text: Acceptable. But the real challenges are yet to come.

CORRECT_ANSWER_HARD.text: Impressive. But your luck will run out.
You may have won the battle, but the war is far from over.
A flicker of brilliance. Let's see if you can sustain it.
Well done. Perhaps you're not as hopeless as I thought.

INCORRECT_ANSWER_EASY.text: Pathetic! You call that an attempt?
Was that a guess, or did you actually think that was correct? Both are equally sad.
I've seen calculators with more processing power than you.

INCORRECT_ANSWER_MEDIUM.text: That was painfully incorrect. Try again.

INCORRECT_ANSWER_HARD.text: And so, your confidence crumbles to dust. As expected.
Perhaps this is too much for your feeble mind.
You have reached the limits of your knowledge. How predictable.
No, no, no! That's not it at all.

FIRST_STRIKE.text: Careful now. The abyss is unforgiving.

LAST_STRIKE.text: Your last chance. Make it count.
One more failure and your soul is forfeit. No pressure.

GAME_OVER.text: Game over. Your soul is mine.
Three strikes. You have failed. As I knew you would.
Your trial ends here. You are not worthy.

SESSION_WIN.text: You've survived... for now. Don't think this is over.
You've cleared all available challenges. Go on, get out of here before I change my mind.
